selections.name: Lucky Star
selections.reason: Consistent performer who placed 2nd at this track and distance last start. Rates highest on recent figures (95).

selections.name: Sharbino
selections.reason: Coming off a solid 2nd at Orange. Maps well and is knocking on the door.

selections.name: Flying Wahine
selections.reason: Drops significantly in class from a Metropolitan/Provincial maiden at Canterbury. Dangerous improver.

selections.name: Stock Road
selections.reason: Has shown glimpses of ability. Place chance in this field.

danger_horse.name: Sharbino
danger_horse.reason: Narrowly beaten last start and has the tactical speed to challenge the top pick.

selections.name: The Contractor
selections.reason: Showed improvement when 4th at Dubbo first-up. Draws the rail and strips fitter.

selections.name: Just Joan
selections.reason: Consistent type who placed 3rd at Dubbo recently. Has early speed to overcome the draw.

selections.name: Nightwalker
selections.reason: Experienced campaigner. 5th recently but previous form at Orange was solid.

selections.name: Lady Giovanna
selections.reason: Resuming from a spell. Trial form is acceptable and draws well.

danger_horse.name: Just Joan
danger_horse.reason: Speedy mare who will look to cross and lead. Hard to catch if left alone.

selections.name: Shylock
selections.reason: Last start winner at Dubbo over 2200m. Stays all day and maps perfectly from barrier 3.

selections.name: Special Prophet
selections.reason: Consistent 4th at Gundagai. Placed at this track prior. Solid each-way hope.

selections.name: Midnight Affair
selections.reason: Drops in grade and distance suits. Can improve sharply here.

selections.name: Will To Excel
selections.reason: Carries top weight but has the class edge. 4th recently at Dubbo.

danger_horse.name: Special Prophet
danger_horse.reason: Racing consistently and handles the distance well.

selections.name: Three Wishes
selections.reason: Excellent 3rd at Nowra on debut. The form line is strong and draws perfectly.

selections.name: Extraglow
selections.reason: Placed 3rd at Gosford in a Provincial maiden. That form is superior to Country grade.

selections.name: Bivacco
selections.reason: Runner-up at Canberra recently. Showing good early speed.

selections.name: Cosmic Eagle
selections.reason: Resuming. Has trialled well and gets the inside run.

danger_horse.name: Extraglow
danger_horse.reason: Provincial form is the key danger. Could simply be too classy.

selections.name: Nor Nor West
selections.reason: Chasing a hat-trick after a dominant win at Dubbo. In peak form and hard to knock.

selections.name: Tiger Town
selections.reason: Drops massively in class from a Midway BM72 at Randwick. Huge threat on ability.

selections.name: Miss Capricorn
selections.reason: Runner-up to the top pick last start. Weight swing and better draw brings her closer.

selections.name: Keadool
selections.reason: Solid 4th in Open company last start. Back to Benchmark grade suits.

danger_horse.name: Tiger Town
danger_horse.reason: Class runner of the field. If he handles the weight, he wins.

selections.name: Drunken Sailor
selections.reason: Last start winner at Dubbo. Carries weight but is in career-best form.

selections.name: Pearler
selections.reason: Consistent mare who ran well for 4th at Moruya. Maps to get a soft run.

selections.name: Lady Revolution
selections.reason: Placed 3rd at Wagga recently. Light weight and good draw.

selections.name: Commando Jack
selections.reason: Honest 5th at Dubbo. Usually competitive in this grade.

danger_horse.name: Pearler
danger_horse.reason: Gets the run of the race and hits the line hard.

selections.name: Chico Casino
selections.reason: 4th at this track and distance recently. Draws perfectly to strike.

selections.name: Gidgee Guy
selections.reason: Veteran who drops in class. 8th last start but better suited here.

selections.name: Side Cash
selections.reason: Resuming. Trialled well and could sprint well fresh.

selections.name: Off Shaw
selections.reason: Top weight but has the highest class rating. Needs luck from the gate.

danger_horse.name: Gidgee Guy
danger_horse.reason: Proven performer at this level who can pop up at odds.

exotic_strategy.strategy: Field in First 4. Small win bet #3.

selections.name: Fire 'N' Stone
selections.reason: Ran 4th at Kembla Grange in a Class 1. That Provincial form is superior to this field.

selections.name: Yes Siree
selections.reason: Another dropping from Provincial grade (Gosford). Major player.

selections.name: Shirley's Tribute
selections.reason: Resuming. Won maiden well last prep and looks progressive.

selections.name: Bulla Vinaka
selections.reason: Consistent runner-up at Orange. Will be in the finish again.

danger_horse.name: Yes Siree
danger_horse.reason: Proven at a higher level than most of these.
